data.approach: Enhance console log capture with: 1) Configurable buffer size (default 50), 2) Stack trace capture for errors, 3) Sensitive data filtering (tokens, passwords, keys), 4) Improved timestamp handling. The content script already has basic console capture - need to enhance it with the required features.

summary: Implemented configurable console log capture with default 50-entry buffer
Added comprehensive sensitive data filtering (API keys, JWTs, passwords, AWS creds, credit cards)
Added stack trace capture for error/warn/trace logs with file/line/column info
Added debug and trace console methods in addition to log/error/warn/info
Added new message handlers: GET_CONSOLE_LOGS, UPDATE_CONSOLE_CONFIG, GET_CONSOLE_CONFIG, CLEAR_CONSOLE_LOGS
Updated background script with deduplication for stored logs
reviewFocus: Verify sensitive data patterns cover common cases
Check stack trace parsing works across browsers

summary: Implemented console log capture mechanism in browser extension
Created configurable log storage with maximum entry limit
Added timestamp and stack trace capture for log entries
Implemented sensitive data filtering for log outputs
Developed popup interface for retrieving captured console logs

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Console Log Capture Module
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests to validate console log capture functionality. Tests should cover log interception, filtering, storage limit enforcement, and data sanitization. Target files: extension/src/modules/console-logger.ts and related test files.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability and correctness of log capture implementation

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Performance Tracking for Console Log Capture
suggestedTasks.description: Add performance monitoring to prevent log capture from impacting browser extension performance. Implement lightweight capture mechanism with minimal runtime overhead. Focus on extension/src/popup/popup.ts and console log injection scripts.
suggestedTasks.reason: Prevent potential performance degradation during extensive logging

patterns: Use configurable defaults for log storage
Implement sensitive data filtering as a core feature

documentationNeeds: Update extension README with console log capture feature details
